title: From her school Meenu walks 20 metres towards north. She, then turns left and walks 40 metres. She again turns left and walks 20 metres. Further she moves 20 metres after turning to the right. How far is she from her original position? - Quora

response.answer_text: A diagram is ready to check Meenu’s final location with respect to her starting point. She walked 20 m towards North and then walked 40km towards left i.e., towards West and after another left turn, she walked 20 km towards South and walking 20 km in each occasion first towards North and then South she has come back from North to South direction to the spot 40 km away in West from starting point. As she took the right turn and walked another 20 km she is finally at 40+20 or 60 km in the west from the starting point.
TOTAL DISTANCE FROM SCHOOL TO PONT B IS 60M20+40=60M  THANK YOU.
